item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Job Inquires Job related inquires can be made on LinkedIn. Open Source Work Questions related to open source work should be made on GitHub.

item.title: About
item.description: Bio I am a Site Reliability Engineer currently working at Red Hat helping build and deploy reliable, secure, and scalable managed services on top of Managed OpenShift. Work Experience Red Hat Inc. (Nov 2021 - Present) Site Reliability Engineer Managed a service deployment pipeline to faciliate CI/CD for managed services on OpenShift. Designed and implemented a custom CLI plug-in to extend the features of the ocm-cli to improve workflow for our team and customers.
